data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Ball goes out of play for a Tosu goal kick.
In the minute 1, Ball safe as Sapporo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Tosu at Sapporo.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Sapporo's Kim Min-Tae is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 6, Cho Dong-geon is back on his feet again.
Kim Min-Tae is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 6, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Cho Dong-geon for Tosu who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Kim Min-Tae is booked for the home team.
Throw-in Tosu.
Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Tosu.
In the minute 8, In Sapporo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sapporo takes a corner from the left.
Takuro Kaneko (Sapporo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 12, Throw-in high up the field for Tosu in Sapporo.
Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Tosu at Sapporo.
In the minute 14, Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tosu's half?
Free kick in a good position for Sapporo!
Free kick Sapporo.
In the minute 19, Akito Fukumori of Sapporo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Tosu in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 21, Sapporo to take a throw-in in Tosu territory.
Tosu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sapporo's Lucas Fernandes misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Sapporo in the half of Tosu.
Tosu's Shinya Nakano is on target but unsuccessful.
Anderson Lopes of Sapporo gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 30, Tosu have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sapporo.
Yuta Higuchi (Tosu) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Tosu.
Sapporo have a goal kick.
Tosu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Tosu at Sapporo.
Tosu pushes forward through Tiago Alves, whose finish on goal is saved.
Tiago Alves (Tosu) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 36, Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
Throw-in for Tosu in their own half.
Sapporo drive upfield and Anderson Lopes gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Tosu defender.
In the minute 39, Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tosu's half?
Free kick Sapporo.
Tosu drives forward and Ryoya Morishita gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 40, Tosu takes a corner from the right.
Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
Throw-in Sapporo.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Tosu in the half of Sapporo.
Sapporo are caught offside.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Sapporo.
Ball safe as Tosu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Tosu.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Sapporo to take a throw-in in Tosu territory.
In the minute 46, Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Sapporo.
Corner awarded to Tosu.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Sapporo at Sapporo.
Goal kick for Tosu at Sapporo.
Throw-in for Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 54, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Tosu takes a corner from the right.
Own goal! Takuro Kaneko scores in his own net to make it 0-1.
In the minute 58, Ball safe as Sapporo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Jay Bothroyd is replacing Douglas for the home team.
In the minute 60, The home team replace Takuro Kaneko with Kosuke Shirai.
Sapporo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Sapporo capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 61, Ryoya Morishita (Tosu) gets a yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sapporo.
Jay Bothroyd is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
In the minute 64, Sapporo to take a throw-in in Tosu territory.
Throw-in for Tosu in the half of Sapporo.
Ball safe as Tosu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 65, Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tosu's half?
Tosu needs to be cautious. Sapporo have an attacking throw-in.
Sapporo drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Yohei Toyoda is on a sub for Tiago Alves for Tosu.
In the minute 68, Tosu make their second substitution with Daichi Hayashi replacing Cho Dong-geon.
Tosu takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 72, In Sapporo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team replace Akito Fukumori with Naoki Ishikawa.
In the minute 74, Sapporo make their fourth substitution with Yoshihiro Nakano replacing Yoshiaki Komai.
Sapporo drive upfield and Anderson Lopes gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Tosu defender.
Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Yoshihiro Nakano (Sapporo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 79, Can Tosu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sapporo's half?
Throw-in Tosu.
Ryota Hayasaka is on a sub for Anderson Lopes for Sapporo.
In the minute 81, Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 83, Corner awarded to Tosu.
In Sapporo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 85, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sapporo.
Kaisei Ishii is replacing Fuchi Honda for the away team.
Throw-in for Sapporo in their own half.
Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tosu's half?
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Tosu.
Free kick Sapporo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Sapporo in the half of Tosu.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sapporo are coming forward and Lucas Fernandes gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Tosu have a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
